SELECT
FROM sys_permission t1 INNER JOIN role_permission t2 ON t1.id = t2.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id INNER JOIN user_role t4 ON t3.id = t4.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user t5 ON t4.user_id = t5.id WHERE t5.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by t1.order_num
select id,parent_id,permission_name as title,icon from sys_permission where status = 1 order by order_num
